item.description:
Isn't it fun to be part of St. Patrick's Day celebrations and enjoy the feel and spirit of the day?
The not fun part is waiting for a table so that you can get the day's corned beef and cabbage. Not to mention that here in Boston there is a disproportionate number of college kids doing the same. What do you think of us Baby Boomers heading in another direction and celebrating St Patrick's Day with a Greek salad, grape leaves, and souvlaki. Sound good? Please join us!

group.name: Boston Baby Boomers Meetup Group-Social Fun

item.name: St Patrick's Day - Greek Dinner Meetup
